data.title: Facts About the Rockford Files
data.meta_description: If you’ve read much of my work, you know that James Garner is one of my favorite actors, and “The Rockford Files” is my favorite detective show and one of my favorite TV shows period. I decided to do…
data.text:
It’s still the best detective show of all time.

If you’ve read much of my work, you know that James Garner is one of my favorite actors, and “The Rockford Files” is my favorite detective show and one of my favorite TV shows period. I decided to do a little more research on the show.

Obviously, James Garner was the primary driving force behind the series success, but other elements also came into play. There was a strong supporting cast, as well as really good writing. So, here are some things you might not have known about ‘The Rockford Files.”

1: Jim Rockford had a bunch of interesting messages on his machine. Altogether, there were 122 messages.

And amazingly, almost all of them were bad news.

2: Did you enjoy ‘The Rockford Files” theme song? You aren’t the only one.

The song was released as a single in 1975 and reached number 10 on the charts. I believe the category was “Best Detective Show Theme Song.”

3: James Garner’s work was appreciated. He received four Golden Globe nominations and an Emmy Award for Best Actor.
